Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to World Trade Center related accidental death benefit for Luis Palermo
Summary: Permits the widow of Luis Palermo to apply for a World Trade Center related accidental death benefit for participation in the rescue, recovery, and clean-up operations as a member of the Nassau county police department.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize the widow of Luis Palermo to apply for World Trade Center related accidental death benefits from the New York state and local police and fire retirement system
